bug.author: gwtnb
bug.summary: Old numpy.linalg.norm has no keepdims argument
bug.description:
on NumPy 1.9 does not have argument but <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pfnet/chainer/blob/master/tests/cupy_tests/linalg_tests/test_norms.py#L57>Chainer's test uses</denchmark-link> . NumPy 1.9: <denchmark-link:https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.9.0/reference/generated/numpy.linalg.norm.html>https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.9.0/reference/generated/numpy.linalg.norm.html</denchmark-link>
NumPy 1.10: <denchmark-link:https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.10.1/reference/generated/numpy.linalg.norm.html>https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.10.1/reference/generated/numpy.linalg.norm.html</denchmark-link>
